Articles.Content:
Live from the launchpad

Kerbal space program has updated to 1.0 and its high time I got my career mode under way. Valentina join Jeb and the Boys for the formation of Twtchtech 

As it traditional with our first few episodes for Kerbal career, I shall be commentating live along with my gameplay and trouble making

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/chpN9sXAIMA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Lets go to space today!! 

 That of course is if Jebediah does not steal all available seats. The main focus on todays episode is to throw a small hunk of metal above the atmosphere, on to orbit?

The air provides much resistance to the Idea but the science and engineering of the proud Kerbal race should be enough to overcome.. if we can just fly it well 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/05GKkvFerCU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Up and down Tourism

No one wants us to go to the Mun for them and this has made Valentina very sad.. so Jebediah is stepping forth like the glory hog he is to kick start the space tourism in the Kerbal Universe 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/REGi8mM89QA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Unintentional Gravity Assist

Today is the day for the greatly anticipated Mun flyby and boy does it prove to be a bit of a doozy with our current research and launch facilities!!

Spirits start high with memories of last seasons Mun successes and triumphs, only to be brought crashing down by the new aerodynamics and lack of suitable sizes fuel tanks, but it will take far more than that to stop us.. for thus is the Kerbal way

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dCoLaK4-6uA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Gene has prepared a nice double contract mission for us to get our teeth into, rendezvous and rescue. So we can welcome a new member to our crew.. but there is more than one way to have a crash

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLifjI8hk6aLXOMrKUiutdymSxOH9eZV-Z" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

After the glories of welcoming a new crew member to the fold, it's time to put our heads together with Gene Kerman and select contract for a MISSION TO THE MUN!!!

Valentina has been selected for this most historic event, commanding the brand new Collins Craft, Piloting both herself and our glorious space program to new heights and wonders

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/V8CM1kDXMMk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Valentina has been stranded around the Mun and needs someone to pootle on over and rescue her.. Unfortunately the only man trained for the job is Jeb and rumor has it those 2 don't play nice 

But the pride of the program is at stake so personal feelings will have to be put aside and they shall have to finish the mission in the professional manner we have come to expect of member of the kerbal space program 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/U4hxENiFEQw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Today Gene has out done himself and managed to source 2 contracts from rival space programs to rescue their Kerbals from substandard vessels in orbit

The robo crew is all excited as this will be the first mission to be launched Unkerballed, and the entire space center is excited as we get to welcome new kerbals to our space program

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yj2w2dx6ysQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Building on our reputation as kerbals foremost tourist haulage company and slamming some satellites into orbit for fun and profit

Relegating Jeb to the job as busdriver 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fsV9-7rmpSA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I really wanted to get an orbital station around Kerbin as a tourist waypoint, unfortunately the Kerbals in engineering tell us we're missing some VITAL parts to make the ULTIMATE STATION

So instead Valentina is going to MINMUS for fun, profit and science!!

The ship design is innovative and the mission profile is unusual as is the way when you fly with Twtchtech

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CkFFrSw570A?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I have a dream for an orbital station around everybody in the kerbin system

Shuttles and Transports set up to ferry Tourists and cargo to the orbits of the outer bodys and down to awaiting tourist attractions

Step one.. station for LKO to Mun transfer handoff

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Z_hfnCZoO5g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Proving ourselves as the foremost tourist redistribution company is not easy task.. especially when you want them to have something to do on the Mun 

We're letting Jeb fly this one as he seems a little less "Bouncy" when out and about.. and we have science to perform

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ThqsokLDqGU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
